an6.84:1.1: “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagatassa bhikkhuno ya ratti va divaso va agacchati haniyeva patikankha kusalesu dhammesu, no vuddhi.
an6.84:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mahiccho hoti, vighatava, asantuttho, itaritaracivarapindapatasenasanagilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharena, assaddho hoti, dussilo hoti, kusito hoti, mutthassati hoti, duppanno hoti.
an6.84:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannagatassa bhikkhuno ya ratti va divaso va agacchati haniyeva patikankha kusalesu dhammesu, no vuddhi.
an6.84:2.1: Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagatassa bhikkhuno ya ratti va divaso va agacchati vuddhiyeva patikankha kusalesu dhammesu, no parihani.
an6.84:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na mahiccho hoti, avighatava, santuttho, itaritaracivarapindapatasenasanagilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharena, saddho hoti, silava hoti, araddhaviriyo hoti, satima hoti, pannava hoti.
an6.84:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannagatassa bhikkhuno ya ratti va divaso va agacchati vuddhiyeva patikankha, kusalesu dhammesu no parihani”ti.
